definitions: The action of removing all coverings or clothes from someone or something.
The process of removing paint, varnish, or other coatings from a surface.
The act of depriving someone of property, rights, or status.
The process of separating components, such as in chemical or industrial processes.
examples: The stripping of the old wallpaper was a tedious task.
He was accused of stripping the company of its assets.
The chemical stripping process required careful handling.
The artist was stripping the canvas to its bare form.
